CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In particular , the acenedithiophene family , in which two thiophenes are fused at the ends of acenes , such as benzodithiophenes ( BDTs ) , 8 naphthodithiophenes ( NDTs ) , 9 and anthradithiophenes ( ADTs ) , 10 offers multiple advantages over other classes owing to their ease of functionalization at the α-positions of thiophene substructures for easy and precise cross-coupling polymerization.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| acenedithiophene |
| benzodithiophenes (BDTs) |
| 8 naphthodithiophenes (NDTs) |
| anthradithiophenes (ADTs) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| acenedithiophene |
| benzodithiophenes (BDTs) |
| naphthodithiophenes (NDTs) |
| anthradithiophenes (ADTs) |
